practice_phrases.target: I want to know the truth
She wants to know the truth
I want you to tell me the truth

practice_phrases.known: 他不想让任何人听到真相
practice_phrases.target: He doesn't want to let anyone hear the truth

practice_phrases.known: 我想让你现在告诉我真相
practice_phrases.target: I want you to tell me the truth now

practice_phrases.known: 我不确定我能不能告诉你真相
practice_phrases.target: I'm not sure if I can tell you the truth

practice_phrases.known: 我们不想让任何人听到真相。
practice_phrases.target: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.
